name: Better Fart Alone
description:
How to play

You are visiting your partner’s house for first time, but you are nervous, your tummy is upset and can’t hold in your farts. Try to fart around the house without being caught, when your intestine is full you can’t hold it in anymore and will fart, you can also fart when your intestine is half way with E.

Game Jam

Game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 8 with the theme "you're not alone". Had 7 days to do it as solo dev, all gameplay done by me and made most of the assets, didn't do the characters.
